title: 5 Min Routine: Daily Journal
summary: The simplest and most effective way to be happier in just 5 min a day!
description: 5 Min a Day is the simplest and most effective way to be happier in just 5 min a day! It is designed for your Android Wear device, so you don't have to waste time and do the things you love!While simple and easy to use, 5 Min a Day gives you a complete tool to keep you happy and engaged in your life! The journal includes the following notes★ Happiness - simply smile★ Inspire - read motivational quote★ Gratitude - say 3 things you are grateful for★ Training - do a 5 minute morning workoutFeatures★ Simple daily routine based on applied positive psychology discoveries★ Inspirational quotes to help you start your day you should★ Clean & easy to use material design★ Optimised for Android Wear smartwatches★ Battery efficient★ Designed for round & rectangular Android Wear devicesCompatible with the following smartwatches• LG G/R Watch• Samsung Gear Live• Motorola Moto 360• Asus ZenWatch• Sony Smartwatch 3How to use- Install 5 Min Routine: Daily Journal- Every morning start the app by saying "Ok, Google, start Journal"- Follow the simple routine- Enjoy happier life!
descriptionHTML:
5 Min a Day is the simplest and most effective way to be happier in just 5 min a day! It is designed for your Android Wear device, so you don't have to waste time and do the things you love!

While simple and easy to use, 5 Min a Day gives you a complete tool to keep you happy and engaged in your life!

The journal includes the following notes

★ Happiness - simply smile
★ Inspire - read motivational quote
★ Gratitude - say 3 things you are grateful for
★ Training - do a 5 minute morning workout

Features

★ Simple daily routine based on applied positive psychology discoveries
★ Inspirational quotes to help you start your day you should
★ Clean & easy to use material design
★ Optimised for Android Wear smartwatches
★ Battery efficient
★ Designed for round & rectangular Android Wear devices

Compatible with the following smartwatches

• LG G/R Watch
• Samsung Gear Live
• Motorola Moto 360
• Asus ZenWatch
• Sony Smartwatch 3

How to use

- Install 5 Min Routine: Daily Journal
- Every morning start the app by saying "Ok, Google, start Journal"
- Follow the simple routine
- Enjoy happier life!
